data.eml:eml: Chinese species of the genus of Agnesiella Dworakowska (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybini), with four new species and four new records

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yan, Bin, Yang, Mao-Fa (2019): Chinese species of the genus of Agnesiella Dworakowska (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybini), with four new species and four new records. Zootaxa 4565 (2): 151-170, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4565.2.1
